items.summary:
Woot is back again today with loads of discounts on official Apple Solo Loops, including both the standard silicone models and the braided variants. While Apple no longer sells these exact bands, they are compatible with just about all Apple Watch models from 38mm up to the latest 46mm Apple Watch Series 11 models. Originally $49 and $99, you can land these bands in wide array of sizes and colors for as low as $14.99 Prime shipped today.

items.title: Logitech Woot sale back at up to 65% off: Mac and gaming accessories from just $9
items.summary:
Woot is back with yet another Logitech sale, serving up a wide range of the brand’s gaming and workstation accessories at some of the lowest prices we’ve seen. The lineup spans everything from Mac and iPad accessories to full-on gaming gear, but this particular sale puts a clear spotlight on keyboards, with plenty of items starting from as low as $9. As usual, this Woot sale includes a mix of refurbished units, though several standout picks are also available in brand new condition like some of our favorites we’ve highlighted below. Notably, you can also use promo code LOGITECHFIVE during checkout to knock an additional $5 off the already discounted prices for a limited time.

You probably know that there are a lot of earbuds out there that sound great—until you start moving, take a call outside, or hit that point in the day where everything needs to happen at once.
